<small>Aramaic form: [[H5776]]</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּף‎</span> **verb** ==fly== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, (rare) ***flicker, flutter***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺף‎</span> ***fowl***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עוֺפָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***augury***, from birds (compare [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Heid. 2, 202</sup>), ***fortune***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***practice augury***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***augur***; also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fly about***, of birds); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָפוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.11.14|Isa 11:14]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעוּף‎</span> [[Job.20.8|Job 20:8]]; [[Ps.91.5|Ps 91:5]] + [[Prov.23.5|Prov 23:5]]b [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ועוף‎</span> [[[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]]], or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ועיף‎</span> [Ginsb]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּעֹ֑ף‎</span> [[2Sam.22.11|2Sam 22:11]] = [[Ps.18.11|Ps 18:11]]; [[Nah.3.16|Nah 3:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫עָף‎</span> [[Isa.6.6|Isa 6:6]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הֲ)תָעוּף‎</span> [[Prov.23.5|Prov 23:5]] a [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (see below); 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעוּפֶינָה‎</span> [[Isa.60.8|Isa 60:8]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּף‎</span> [[Job.5.7|Job 5:7]]; [[Prov.26.2|Prov 26:2]] ***Participle*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָפָה‎</span> [[Zech.5.1|Zech 5:1]]; [[Zech.5.2|Zech 5:2]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָפוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.31.5|Isa 31:5]] — 

**1. a.** ***fly***, of birds [[Deut.4.17|Deut 4:17]], specifically of swallow (in simile) [[Prov.26.2|Prov 26:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּד‎</span>); of seraph [[Isa.6.6|Isa 6:6]] (compare 

**Po\`1.**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> riding (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רכב‎</span>) on cherub [[2Sam.22.11|2Sam 22:11]] = [[Ps.18.11|Ps 18:11]] roll (in vision) [[Zech.5.1|Zech 5:1]]; [[Zech.5.2|Zech 5:2]] arrow [[Ps.91.5|Ps 91:5]] of swift army [[Isa.11.14|Isa 11:14]] (under figure of bird, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָתֵף‎</span>) [[Hab.1.8|Hab 1:8]] (simile of vulture); figurative of ships (like cloud, or doves) [[Isa.60.8|Isa 60:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵירֶֿשֶׁף יַגְבִּיהוּ עוּף‎</span> [[Job.5.7|Job 5:7]] ***make high to fly***, i.e. make their flight high, soar aloft (simile of irresistible tendency). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***hover*** (protectingly) [[Isa.31.5|Isa 31:5]] (birds, simile of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; on sense compare [[Deut.32.11|Deut 32:11]]). 

**2.** ***fly away***, to a distance, [[Ps.55.7|Ps 55:7]] (figurative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְחִיק נְדֹד‎</span> v[[Ps.55.8|Ps 55:8]]); = vanish, of locusts [[Nah.1.16|Nah 1:16]] (figurative); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּנֶשֶׁר יָעוּף הַשָּׁמַיִם‎</span> [[Prov.23.5|Prov 23:5]]b ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]) simile of riches (see Toy); of wicked [[Job.20.8|Job 20:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּחֲלוֺם‎</span>); end of life, in general, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַנָּעֻ֑פָה‎</span> [[Ps.90.10|Ps 90:10]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲתָעוּף‎</span> [[Prov.23.5|Prov 23:5]] a [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], ***do thine eyes fly*** (***light***) upon ***it*** ? (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲתָעִיף‎</span> **Hiph\`il** [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ***dost thou cause thine eyes to fly***, etc. ?) is difficult, and line perhaps not original (see Toy). 

**Po\`l. 1.** ***fly about, to and fro; Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעוֺפֵף‎</span> of birds [[Gen.1.20|Gen 1:20]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); seraphim [[Isa.6.2|Isa 6:2]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרָף מְעוֺפֵף‎</span> ***flying*** fiery serpent [[Isa.14.29|Isa 14:29]]; [[Isa.30.6|Isa 30:6]]. 

**2.** ***cause to fly to and fro, brandish, Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעוֺפְפִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַרְבִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.32.10|Ezek 32:10]] ***when I brandish my sword*** before them. **Hithpo\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּעוֺף יִתְעוֺפֵף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּבוֺדָם‎</span> [[Hos.9.11|Hos 9:11]] ***like a bird their glory shall fly away***. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], see **Qal** near the end 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּף‎</span>], I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיף‎</span>] **verb** ==be dark==; — only **Qal** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּעֻ֫פָה‎</span> [[Job.11.17|Job 11:17]] (though) ***it be dark***, but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעֻפָה‎</span>, substantive, see below 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיף‎</span>] **verb be** ==faint== (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> **3**, [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2835</sup>; \|\| form of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יעף‎</span> q. v.; occurrences dubious); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽיְפָה נַפְשִׁי לְ‎</span> [[Jer.4.31|Jer 4:31]] (? read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲיֵפָה‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫עַף‎</span> [[Judg.4.21|Judg 4:21]] (&lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיָעֵף‎</span> [[BDB#GFM|GFM]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]), [[1Sam.14.28|1Sam 14:28]] (strike out [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] Löhr, emendation [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]), v[[1Sam.14.31|1Sam 14:31]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּעַף‎</span> [√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יעף‎</span>] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]), [[2Sam.21.15|2Sam 21:15]] (corrupt, [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]; for Philistine name [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]).
